div:
Command help
Name
help Prints help on commands and syntax
Synopsis
help [options] commands
help [options] <command>
Options
-n,-nobrowse Do not launch a browser for detailed help
Description
The help command provides online help on xmlsh commands and syntax.
A minimum amount of help, typically a synopsis, is availble with the installed xmlsh product and is printed on the output.
If a command or topic has more detailed help available online, the URL is printed and optinonaly a broweser is launched with the URL.
See Also xecho
